files.patch:
@@ -97,0 +97,1 @@ +

  • All .inline.hpp files should include their corresponding .hpp file as the first include line. Externally used declarations should be put in the .hpp file, and not in the the .inline.hpp file. This rule exists to resolve problems with circular dependencies between.inline.hpp files.

@@ -141,0 +141,5 @@
+* All .inline.hpp files should include their corresponding .hpp file
+as the first include line. Externally used declarations should be put
+in the .hpp file, and not in the the .inline.hpp file. This rule exists
+to resolve problems with circular dependencies between.inline.hpp files.
+
